body.name: Dove Body Love Beauty Bar Soap Eczema-Prone Skin Care 10 Count Fragrance Free Instantly Soothes & Nourishes Dry-Itchy Skin Colloidal Oatmeal 7.5 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs
features: CARE FOR ECZEMA-PRONE SKIN: Dove Body Love Eczema-Prone Skin Care Beauty Bar gently cleanses and moisturizes eczema-prone skin
MADE WITH DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED INGREDIENTS: This beauty bar with Colloidal Oatmeal helps soothe dry-itchy skin
FRAGRANCE FREE: This gentle beauty bar soap is suitable for sensitive skin
RICH HYDRATION: Help maintain your skin's natural moisture barrier and hydration with this beauty bar, ideal to use as a facial cleanser and body wash for sensitive skin
CLEAN INGREDIENTS: This cleanser is made with naturally-derived gentle skin cleansers, no sulfates or parabens, is PETA-certified cruelty free
body.description: Care for your skin condition, now starts in the shower with the Dove Body Love Eczema-Prone Skin Care Beauty Bar Soap with Colloidal Oatmeal to help soothe dry-itchy skin. This beauty bar is paraben-free, sulfate-free, and is made with plant-based cleansers to transform even the driest skin in just one shower. How To Use: Use your Beauty Bar as a facial cleanser or as a gentle skin cleanser for your body and hands. For best results, rub between wet hands and massage the smooth, creamy lather over your skin before rinsing thoroughly. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look—reaching over ¼ of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We are also committed to a landmark new initiative as part of our 2025 commitment to reduce plastic waste; reducing over 20,500 metric tons of virgin plastic annually by making the iconic beauty bar packaging plastic-free globally; launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles; and trialing a new refillable deodorant format that radically reduces plastic use. As one of the largest beauty brands in the world, we are revealing an agenda-setting commitment to tackle the global beauty industry’s plastic waste issue.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Co-Created with Dermatologists This beauty bar was co-created with leading board dermatologists. Each formula was uniquely developed for specific skin conditions to bring specialized care to skin in need of extra love. Fragrance Free This beauty bar is fragrance free to be suitable for eczema-prone sensitive skin. Show Your Body Some Love Dove Body Love is designed to shower your body with the love your skin condition deserves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So happy I was able to buy this in bulk. Wish it came sold in with more than 2 bars. Prefect purchase for my sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewText: Great soap specially, for private parts highly recommend it

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars None scented bar soaps
reviews.reviewText: It's not scented, gentle to skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soothes dry itchy eczema-prone skin
reviews.reviewText: After seeing ads for this product I tried to find it in local stores or on other sellers' websites but couldn't. I wanted to try it out by buying 1 pack (2 bars) but finally bought the 10-pack sold on Amazon. I feel it does what it says, soothes dry itchy eczema-prone. I alternate between the soap & the body wash in the same line (as I've always done with Dove sensitive skin bar soaps & body wash). I would recommend the Dove body love eczema-prone bar soap. I can't use skin care products that have fragrance so this unscented soap works great for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dry skin
reviews.reviewText: This product is nice because it keeps my skin from getting dry during the cold weather. It feels creamy on the skin like moistuzer and I love it. I have very reactive skin and this keeps my skin calm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: does the job skin no longer itches and skin is soft i have always used dove soap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have poor skin prone to be irritated and can never find a soap that I like. my nose has become sensitive as well so strong scents is terrible for me now even though I love scents they make me sneeze and trigger my allergies and kill my eyes too. This soap has no smell at all if that’s what you need. the soap lathers great and makes you feel clean and less irritated. Hope this will help someone definitely recommend.Overall- no smell for sensitive sniffers, and helps with your skin.
